channel.title: Im confused with my client and reg server
channel.description: I got a Client have the backround and everything. So how do i get my server to work on the client, like Sprites, ect. DO i open up my Reg. server folder and run it?

item.title: Im confused with my client and reg server
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Devil Unholy Devil
item.description:
@Unholy_Devil wrote:

xx nub xx:

us propr ingles… but i think you were asking how to set new sprites and stuff like that? That is strictly client-side, and for sprites, it is mostly in class30_sub1_sub1.java

i don’t got a class30_sub1_sub1.java

Read full topic
item.source: Im confused with my client and reg server
